item.title: End-to-End testing with Playwright, part I
item.description: I started working with Playwright by accident. YouTube has shown me a recommendation - a short film by Nick Chapsas (yt | t) about testing user interfaces with SpecFlow and Playwright. While I admire the SpecFlow, BDD and Gherkin ideas - I still haven’t convinced myself to use them. But Playwright + C# have drawn my attention. Then I found a webinar recording with Andrey Lushnikov, and I was sold on Playwright.
